TopicTitle: MASSIVE Performance Gain with this simple fix! [Editing your Save file]

Articles.Content:
Credit goes to TypicalSim. His og video helped me figure out how to fix my save.

1. Devs, please fix this. 
2. Thank you.

here's my take on it:

That's way too much work for even me. I have a folder with txt files for crafts and I start a new install each time I play. So fast. This is one of those things that has to be addressed by the developers to create a reliable finished product, so if they don't address it, then modders won't either, because the game will be dead.

It'll be in an upcoming patch, and in the meantime you can do this trick, or accept that persistent missions that require saves are not ideal for early access- but aiming for fastest under the bridge is totally fine! Or have you maybe tried to "thread the needle, twice"?
